</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-codelayout-cpp-/chaint">ChainT</a></>}>
A chain (ordered sequence) of nodes in the graph. <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-codelayout-cpp-/chaint/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

  type="class"

</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-codelayout-cpp-/jumpt">JumpT</a></>}>
An arc in the graph, typically corresponding to a jump between two nodes. <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-codelayout-cpp-/jumpt/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-codelayout-cpp-/mergedjumpst">MergedJumpsT</a></>}>
A wrapper around two concatenated vectors (chains) of jumps. <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-codelayout-cpp-/mergedjumpst/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-codelayout-cpp-/mergednodest">MergedNodesT</a></>}>
A wrapper around three concatenated vectors (chains) of nodes; it is used to avoid extra instantiation of the vectors. <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-codelayout-cpp-/mergednodest/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-codelayout-cpp-/mergegaint">MergeGainT</a></>}>
The gain of merging two chains, that is, the Ext-TSP score of the merge together with the corresponding merge &#39;type&#39; and &#39;offset&#39;. <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-codelayout-cpp-/mergegaint/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-codelayout-cpp-/nodet">NodeT</a></>}>
A node in the graph, typically corresponding to a basic block in the CFG or a function in the call graph. <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-codelayout-cpp-/nodet/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

### mergeNodes() {#a800ced24f890a965660badbbd70800d2}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>MergedNodesT anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;CodeLayout.cpp&#125;::mergeNodes (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> std::vector&lt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-codelayout-cpp-/nodet">NodeT</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; X, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> std::vector&lt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-codelayout-cpp-/nodet">NodeT</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; Y, size&#95;t MergeOffset, <a href="#a891fbaa9000c6c378ce647324830b0e6">MergeTypeT</a> MergeType)</>}>
Merge two chains of nodes respecting a given &#39;type&#39; and &#39;offset&#39;.

If MergeType == 0, then the result is a concatenation of two chains. Otherwise, the first chain is cut into two sub-chains at the offset, and merged using all possible ways of concatenating three chains.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/codelayout-cpp/#l00561">561</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/codelayout-cpp">CodeLayout.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
